verses.verse: מִזְמ֥וֹר <S%H4210><s%> A Psalm לְדָוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> of David בְּ֝בָרְח֗וֹ <S%H1272><s%> when he fled מִפְּנֵ֤י ׀ <S%H6440><s%> from אַבְשָׁל֬וֹם <S%H53><s%> Absalom בְּנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> his son יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> LORD מָֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> how רַבּ֣וּ <S%H7231><s%> how are they increased צָרָ֑י <S%H6862><s%> that trouble רַ֝בִּ֗ים <S%H7227><s%> me many קָמִ֥ים <S%H6965><s%> [are] they that rise up עָלָֽי׃ <S%H5921><s%> against

רַבִּים֮ <S%H7227><s%> Many אֹמְרִ֪ים <S%H559><s%> [there be] which say לְנַ֫פְשִׁ֥י <S%H5315><s%> of my soul אֵ֤ין <S%H369><s%> There יְֽשׁוּעָ֓תָה <S%H3444><s%> [There is] no help לּ֬וֹ בֵֽאלֹהִ֬ים <S%H430><s%> for him in God סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah

וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> O יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> But thou O LORD מָגֵ֣ן <S%H4043><s%> [art] a shield בַּעֲדִ֑י <S%H1157><s%> about כְּ֝בוֹדִ֗י <S%H3519><s%> for me my glory וּמֵרִ֥ים <S%H7311><s%> and the lifter up רֹאשִֽׁי׃ <S%H7218><s%> of mine head

ק֭וֹלִי <S%H6963><s%> with my voice אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֶקְרָ֑א <S%H7121><s%> I cried וַיַּֽעֲנֵ֨נִי <S%H6030><s%> and he heard מֵהַ֖ר <S%H2022><s%> hill קָדְשׁ֣וֹ <S%H6944><s%> me out of his holy סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah

אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I שָׁכַ֗בְתִּי <S%H7901><s%> I laid me down וָֽאִ֫ישָׁ֥נָה <S%H3462><s%> and slept הֱקִיצ֑וֹתִי <S%H6974><s%> I awaked כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD יִסְמְכֵֽנִי׃ <S%H5564><s%> sustained

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not אִ֭ירָא <S%H3372><s%> I will not be afraid מֵרִבְב֥וֹת <S%H7233><s%> of ten thousands עָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> of people אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> Who סָ֝בִ֗יב <S%H5439><s%> [themselves] against me round about שָׁ֣תוּ <S%H7896><s%> that have set עָלָֽי׃ <S%H5921><s%> against

ק֘וּמָ֤ה <S%H6965><s%> Arise יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> O LORD הוֹשִׁ֘יעֵ֤נִי <S%H3467><s%> save אֱלֹהַ֗י <S%H430><s%> me O my God כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הִכִּ֣יתָ <S%H5221><s%> for thou hast smitten אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֹיְבַ֣י <S%H341><s%> all mine enemies לֶ֑חִי <S%H3895><s%> [upon] the cheek bone שִׁנֵּ֖י <S%H8127><s%> the teeth רְשָׁעִ֣ים <S%H7563><s%> of the ungodly שִׁבַּֽרְתָּ׃ <S%H7665><s%> thou hast broken

לַיהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> [belongeth] unto the LORD הַיְשׁוּעָ֑ה <S%H3444><s%> Salvation עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon עַמְּךָ֖ <S%H5971><s%> [is] upon thy people בִרְכָתֶ֣ךָ <S%H1293><s%> thy blessing סֶּֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah
